lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer shot a three-under 68 for a share of the first-round lead in the inaugural Stanford International Pro-Am at windy Turnberry Isle in Aventura, Fla. Momeko Ueda and Young Kim also were at three under, with Ueda shooting a 68 on the par-71 Soffer Course and Kim carding a 67 on the par-70 Miller course.
